nodes.text: Venn was a male crewmember of Solar Array 22-X in the Hetzal system at the time of the Great Hyperspace Disaster. He was injured when the space station was struck by a piece of hyperspace debris, and fell unconscious while trapped with his colleague Sheree. Republic Defense Coalition Captain Finial Bright found Sheree and Venn while searching the station for survivors, and sent a pill droid to assist them.
